Name: Deadstep
About the game: INVISIBLE GHOST GAME DESCRIPTION The Deadstep is a first-person psychological horror game that achieves simple goals. One day, you have a nightmare of being chased by a ghost for five days. You are stuck in a mysterious place and though you look around for help, but it seems to be no one there. Despite the footsteps that youâ€™ve heard from somewhere, you can't still see anything around. The sounds get closer and closer. At that moment, you can see a bloody footprint being stamped on the floor. It was an invisible ghost who lives there and tries to hurt you by screaming to get you out of there. To survive, after finding items that are necessary for the exorcism you have to do a ritual to defeat the ghost. Be careful about the ghost's footprints and footsteps. Find the items and survive before the ghost finds you!
